sentences.chinese: 臨牀上往往伴發急性膀胱炎。

sentences.english: Infection of road unloading make water basically includes cystitis and urethritis .
sentences.chinese: 下尿路感染主要包括膀胱炎和尿道炎。

sentences.english: Abdominal pain is suggestive of pelvic inflammatory disease and suprapubic pain is suggestive of cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 腹痛常提示盆腔感染，恥骨上疼痛常提示膀胱炎。

sentences.english: It is middling positive expression in 2 example of Glandulose cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 腺性膀胱炎2例均中度陽性表達。

sentences.english: Cystitis and urethritis are complications of prolonged use of indwelling catheters.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱炎和尿道炎是長期應用留置導尿管的併發症。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the therapeutic results of patients with glandular cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高腺性膀胱炎的治療效果。

sentences.english: Objective To study the security, reliability of GPV in the treatment of with glandular cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究綠激光治療腺性膀胱炎的安全性和可靠性。

sentences.english: Cystitis is main pathogenic bacteria is coliform organisms.
sentences.chinese: 膀胱炎主要致病菌是大腸桿菌。

sentences.english: The final diagnosis of eosinophilic cystitis was made by cystoscopy and tissue biopsy.
sentences.chinese: 均通過活組織檢查後診斷爲嗜酸性膀胱炎。

sentences.english: This bladder at autopsy has been opened to reveal areas of hyperemia of the mucosa. this is acute cystitis.
sentences.chinese: 屍檢剖開膀胱顯示充血粘膜，是急性膀胱炎的表現。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss clinical and CT features of eosinophilic cystitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討兒童嗜酸性膀胱炎的臨牀及CT表現。

sentences.english: One of the best ways to treat a bladder infection such as cystitis is with cranberry concentrate.
sentences.chinese: 越橘濃縮物是治療膀胱炎等疾病的一種靈丹妙藥。

definition: vaginal infection/inflammation of the vulva or vagina/colpitis
